com.davidbracewell.scripting

Class ScriptEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.scripting.ScriptEnvironment

  • public class ScriptEnvironment
extends Object

    This class wraps the scripting functionality in Java to centralize the most used methods.

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBinding(String varName, Object obj)
      Sets a key/value pair in the state of the ScriptEngine that may either create a Java Language Binding to be used in the execution of scripts or be used in some other way, depending on whether the key is reserved.
      Object eval(Resource script)
      Evaluates a script contained in the file.
      Object eval(Resource script, ScriptContext context)
      Evaluates a script contained in the file.
      Object eval(String script)
      Evaluates a script.
      Object eval(String script, ScriptContext context)
      Evaluates a script using a specified context.
      String getEngineName()
      Gets the name of the engine being used by the environment.
      <T> T getInterface(String objectName, Class<T> clazz)
      Gets an object created in the scripting environment and converts it to a Java Interface.
      String getLanguageName()
      Gets the name of the language being used by the environment.
      Object getObject(String varName)
      Retrieves a value set in the state of this engine.
      Object invokeFunction(String name, Object... args)
      Used to call top-level procedures and functions defined in scripts.
      Object invokeMethod(Object o, String name, Object... args)
      Calls a method on a script object compiled during a previous script execution, which is retained in the state of the ScriptEngine.

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        public Object eval(@NonNull
                   Resource script)
            throws ScriptException,
                   IOException

        Evaluates a script contained in the file. The encoding of the file is expected to be UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        script - - The resource containing the script
        Returns:
        The result of evaluating the script
        Throws:
        ScriptException - Something went wrong
        IOException - Something went wrong reading the file

      • eval

        public Object eval(@NonNull
                   Resource script,
                   ScriptContext context)
            throws ScriptException,
                   IOException

        Evaluates a script contained in the file. The encoding of the file is expected to be UTF-8.

        Parameters:
        script - - The resource containing the script
        context - - The ScriptContext passed to the script engine.
        Returns:
        The result of evaluating the script
        Throws:
        ScriptException - Something went wrong
        IOException - Something went wrong reading the file

      • eval

        public Object eval(String script)
            throws ScriptException

        Evaluates a script. Returns null if the script is null or empty

        Parameters:
        script - The script as a string
        Returns:
        The result of evaluating the script
        Throws:
        ScriptException - Something went wrong

      • eval

        public Object eval(String script,
                   ScriptContext context)
            throws ScriptException

        Evaluates a script using a specified context. Returns null if the script is null or empty

        Parameters:
        script - The script as a string
        context - - The ScriptContext passed to the script engine.
        Returns:
        The result of evaluating the script
        Throws:
        ScriptException - Something went wrong

      • invokeFunction

        public Object invokeFunction(String name,
                             Object... args)
                      throws ScriptException,
                             NoSuchMethodException

        Used to call top-level procedures and functions defined in scripts.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the procedure or function
        args - Arguments to pass to the procedure or function
        Returns:
        The result returned by the procedure or function
        Throws:
        ScriptException - Something went wrong
        NoSuchMethodException - Method did not exist

      • invokeMethod

        public Object invokeMethod(Object o,
                           String name,
                           Object... args)
                    throws ScriptException,
                           NoSuchMethodException

        Calls a method on a script object compiled during a previous script execution, which is retained in the state of the ScriptEngine.

        Parameters:
        o - If the procedure is a member of a class defined in the script and o is an instance of that class returned by a previous execution or invocation, the named method is called through that instance.
        name - The name of the procedure to be called.
        args - Arguments to pass to the procedure. The rules for converting the arguments to scripting variables are implementation-specific.
        Returns:
        The value returned by the procedure. The rules for converting the scripting variable returned by the script method to a Java Object are implementation-specific.
        Throws:
        ScriptException - Something went wrong
        NoSuchMethodException - Method did not exist

      • getInterface

        public <T> T getInterface(String objectName,
                          Class<T> clazz)

        Gets an object created in the scripting environment and converts it to a Java Interface.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the Java Interface
        Parameters:
        objectName - The name of the object in the script
        clazz - The class information for the Java interface
        Returns:
        The object as the Java interface or null if the object does not exist

      • addBinding

        public void addBinding(String varName,
                       Object obj)

        Sets a key/value pair in the state of the ScriptEngine that may either create a Java Language Binding to be used in the execution of scripts or be used in some other way, depending on whether the key is reserved.

        Parameters:
        varName - The name to call the object in the script
        obj - The object

      • getObject

        public Object getObject(String varName)

        Retrieves a value set in the state of this engine.

        Parameters:
        varName - The name of the variable in the script
        Returns:
        The object represented by the variable

      • getEngineName

        public String getEngineName()

        Gets the name of the engine being used by the environment.

        Returns:
        A String representing the engine name

      • getLanguageName

        public String getLanguageName()

        Gets the name of the language being used by the environment.

        Returns:
        A String representing the language name
